review: Works perfectly on android and PC alike. The only trouble I had with set up was a feature of my router that makes each device invisible to each other. 5 minutes of googling and fixed!
author: Shawn

review: I didn't buy it on Amazon but instead went to Wal-Mart to buy it. I wanted to try it as soon as possible and I'm in love!!! The setup is easy and it works like a charm. It has a beta mode that allows you to cast your phone screen onto your tv and now I can play games and let others watch me. Also I can now use some apps that aren't capable with the chromecast because of the cast screen mode. I highly recommend this and for under $40( 30 dollars on Amazon, 35 in stores) it is the most amazing thing out there. I don't own the roku or Amazon tv or the Apple tv, but I do own a chromecast and I'm happy that I got this instead of the other ones.
author: Francisco A.

review: We love our new Chromecast! This is the first streaming device we used. Tried it and a Roku on our tvs. Didn't like the Roku and sent it back. But, we love this Chromecast! Makes streaming so nice & easy!
